short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert Spotify URIs to URLs and vice versa.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily convert Spotify URLs to URIs—and vice versa—with our sleek, user-friendly Chrome extension. Perfect for music lovers, playlist curators, and anyone passionate about sharing Spotify content seamlessly.

Key Features:

✅ Instant Conversion: Convert Spotify URLs to URIs (and back) in just a few seconds.
✅ Universal: Works with artist profiles, podcasts, albums, and single tracks.
✅ One-Click Copy: Copy your converted links to the clipboard effortlessly.
✅ Conversion History: Track and view your recent conversions.
✅ Export to CSV: Download your conversion history in a CSV file for easy organization.
✅ User-Friendly Design: Intuitive and streamlined interface for a smooth experience.

Whether you're a DJ crafting the perfect setlist, a label owner organizing a release, a podcast host sharing music recommendations, or simply a music enthusiast promoting your favorite tracks, our Spotify URL Converter simplifies your workflow.

Say goodbye to tedious, manual conversions and hello to effortless music sharing.

Note: This extension is not affiliated with or endorsed by Spotify. It's an independent tool created by Promoly to enhance your music-sharing capabilities.

Privacy Assurance:
Your privacy matters. All conversions and history are stored locally on your device—no personal data is collected or transmitted.
